summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1574, for the improvement of the alley between Sixth Avenue West and Seventh Avenue West, from West Galer Street to West Garfield Street, by grading the same, under Ordinance No. 16797 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
